attributes.action: The government to call a general election for late 2026
attributes.background: Starmer and The Labour Party have proven to be unfit to hold office. Their policies are directly responsible for making the British people poorer, our country unsafe and unable to defend itself. The Mandelson fiasco heaps more embarrassment on our country. It's time for real change.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
